section.heading: Establishment of the District of Columbia Health and Hospitals Public Benefit Corporation.

annotations.annotation: Chief Procurement Officer qualification: Section 2(c) of D.C. Law 12-xxx (D.C. Act 12-249) provided that nothing in that act shall affect the operations of the District of Columbia Health and Hospitals Public Benefit Corporation pursuant to this chapter.
For temporary addition of chapter, see note to § 44-1101.01.
